name: streamdeck-webthings
description: A Stream Deck plugin to control WebThings Framework devices.

scripts.build: parcel build src/pi/index.html src/plugin/index.html src/setup/index.html -d Sources/org.mozilla.wot.sdPlugin/ --public-url ../
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/pi/index.html src/plugin/index.html src/setup/index.html -d Sources/org.mozilla.wot.sdPlugin/ --public-url ../

author: Garth Braithwaite <garthdb@gmail.com> (http://garthdb.com)
